author: Falk, Ingrid and Bernhard, Delphine and Gérard, Christophe
title: From the Culinary to the Political Meaning of "quenelle" : Using Topic Models For Identifying Novel Senses (De la quenelle culinaire à la quenelle politique : identification de changements sémantiques à l'aide des Topic Models) [in French]
